title: Outback Glamping Getaway in Some of the Oldest Landscapes on Earth
description: Experience the majesty of Australia’s rugged outback at Wilpena Pound Resort. This extraordinary landscape is 800 million years old and is home to some of the most stunning scenery in the world. In this spectacular region, you can learn about the cultures who have lived here for tens of thousands of years or see iconic wildlife like wallabies and emus in their natural habitat. Stay in a luxury Safari Tent equipped with all the mod cons, plus enjoy daily breakfast, a complimentary bottle of wine and convenient 12pm late checkout. Adventure tour upgrades also available.
offer_address: Wilpena Road, Via Hawker, South Australia 5434, Australia

title: Family-Friendly Getaway at the Only Resort in the Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park
description: Experience Australia’s rugged outback at Wilpena Pound Resort - the only resort in the spectacular Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park. This extraordinary landscape is 800 million years old and home to some of the most stunning scenery in the world. Learn about the cultures who have lived here for tens of thousands of years and see iconic wildlife like wallabies and emus in their natural habitat. Enjoy daily breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival, a welcome drink, two-for-one culture tour and a 12 noon late checkout for two people. Travelling as a group? A family package valid for four is also available.
offer_address: Wilpena Road, Via Hawker, South Australia 5434, Australia

title: Safari-Style Glamping in the Flinders Ranges
description: Experience the majesty of Australia’s rugged outback from land and sky with a two-night stay at Wilpena Pound Resort. Learn about the fascinating Indigenous culture on a complimentary Yura Udnyu tour and explore the region at your own pace with half-day mountain bike hire while you stay in a luxury Safari Tent equipped with indulgent mod-cons plus receive daily breakfast, a complimentary bottle of wine and convenient late midday checkout for two.

title: Safari-Style Glamping in the Flinders Ranges
description: Experience the majesty of Australia’s rugged outback from land and sky with a two-night stay at Wilpena Pound Resort. Stay in a luxury Safari Tent equipped with indulgent mod-cons plus receive daily breakfast, nightly two-course dinner, a complimentary bottle of wine and convenient late midday checkout for two. Adventure tour upgrades available!

title: South Australia Flinders Ranges Outback Glamping with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Sleep under a blanket of stars in one of the outback's most iconic camping spots at Discovery Resorts - Wilpena Pound, Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park’s only resort. Home to the majestic Wilpena Pound, an 800-million-year-old natural amphitheatre, this Flinders Ranges safari-style glamping stay invites you to discover a spectacular feat of nature that covers eight times the area of Uluru.

Surround yourself with creature comforts amid 95,000 hectares of rugged mountains, dramatic gorges and abundant wildlife with incredible onsite facilities including a swimming pool, restaurant, bar and a tour centre, where you can book 4WD tours, guided Aboriginal culture walks and bucket-list worthy scenic flights over the incredible landscape.

Visit between May and October for the rare chance to witness a breathtaking natural phenomenon, when floodwaters from Queensland and South Australia flow into Kati Thanda-Lake Eyre, transforming the vast salt bed into an outback oasis.
offer_address: Wilpena Road, Via Hawker, South Australia 5434, Australia

title: Discover the Beauty of the Outback & One of the Oldest Landscapes on Earth
description: Experience the majesty of Australia’s rugged outback at Wilpena Pound Resort. Stay in a luxury Safari Tent equipped with all the mod cons plus enjoy daily breakfast, nightly two-course dinner on select packages, a complimentary bottle of wine and convenient late midday checkout for two. Adventure tour upgrades available.
offer_address: Wilpena Road, Via Hawker, South Australia 5434, Australia

title: Unique Outback Stay near Wilpena Pound
description:
Discover Australia’s unknown wonder, the stunning Wilpena Pound, with a stay at Rawnsley Park Station. A hugely significant Indigenous cultural site, this magnificent natural amphitheatre is the centrepiece of Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park, and the backdrop for this unique escape. Soak up the spectacular 800-million-year-old beauty of this ancient landscape as you enjoy incredible onsite facilities which include the unique ambience of a working sheep farm, a woolshed turned renowned restaurant and a refreshing swimming pool that was named one of Daily Mail UK's '12 Best Pools with a View'. 

With an onsite tour desk and some of the most incredible views in South Australia, there's no better place to soar above the cratered landscape, keep an eye peeled for Indigenous rock art, or admire the night sky than Rawnsley Park Station.

title: Flinders Ranges Safari-Style Glamping
description:
Sleep under a blanket of stars in one of the outback's most iconic camping spots at Wilpena Pound Resort, Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park’s only resort. Home to the majestic Wilpena Pound, an 800-million-year-old natural amphitheatre, this Flinders Ranges safari-style glamping stay invites you to discover a spectacular feat of nature that covers eight times the area of Uluru.

Surround yourself with creature comforts amid 95,000 hectares of rugged mountains, dramatic gorges and abundant wildlife with incredible onsite facilities including a swimming pool, an onsite restaurant and bar, the National Park Visitor Information and a tour centre, where you can book 4WD tours, guided Aboriginal culture walks and 'must do' scenic flights over this incredible landscape.

**Your handpicked inclusions (select packages only):**

- Start each day right with daily à la carte breakfast
- End the day in style with nightly two-course dinner at Ikara Lounge Bar & Bistro (select packages only)
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine
- Make the most of your time in Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park with 25% off cultural experiences, such as walking tours, scenic drives and stargazing
- Experience a sky-high adventure with 10% off scenic flights

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to a Family Tent and add up to two guests (of any age) for a surcharge. See Fine Print for details.
offer_address: Wilpena Road, Via Hawker, South Australia 5434, Australia

title: Flinders Ranges Eco-Luxury near Wilpena Pound
description:
Experience the majesty of South Australia’s rugged outback with a stay at Rawnsley Park Station - an eco-luxury property at the foot of stunning Wilpena Pound. A hugely significant Indigenous cultural site, this magnificent natural amphitheatre is the centrepiece of Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park and the backdrop for this unique outback retreat. Soak up the breathtaking beauty of the ancient landscape as you enjoy the incredible onsite facilities of this working sheep farm, including a woolshed-turned-renowned-restaurant and a refreshing swimming pool with unparalleled views.

Rawnsley Park Station is the perfect destination to embrace the rugged beauty of the outback and separate yourself from hectic city life. From hikes through Wilpena Pound and along the Brachina Gorge Geological Trail to admiring significant sites such as Arkaroo Rock, Bunyeroo Gorge and Sacred Canyon - the possibilities for exploration are endless. With miles upon miles of sprawling terrain at your disposal, days here will be filled with incredible adventures and nights will be spent admiring the outback's starry skies.
